title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: Invalid date/time values are being accepted and stored in the report design, which can lead to incorrect data representation.
EB: The software should reject invalid date/time strings and display an error message to the user, preventing the storage of inaccurate date/time information in the report design.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the report design interface.
2. Input an invalid date/time string that does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format.
3. Attempt to save the report with the invalid date/time value.
